entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 15 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 05 January 2023
